Layout

To use this module, follow the instructions in the README. (For background on PXd, read the Getting Started documentation.)

px-layout-design

How to Use

Install via command line:

Add to component Sass file:

Auto sizing

<div class=layout>
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
  …
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
</div>

1/6

Percentage-based and auto sizing mix

<div class=layout>
  <div class="layout__item u-1/3">…</div>
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
  <div class="layout__item u-1/4">…</div>
</div>

1/3

auto

1/3

auto

auto

1/4

1/6

auto

1/4

Reverse (right to left) layout

Sass Flag

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.

HTML

<div class="layout layout--rev">
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
  …
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
</div>

1st

2nd

3rd

4th

Vertical centering

Sass Flag

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.

HTML

<div class="layout layout--middle">
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
  …
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
</div>

Bottom aligned

Sass Flag

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.

HTML

<div class="layout layout--bottom">
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
  …
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
</div>

Full height layout

Sass Flag

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.

HTML

<div class="layout layout--full">
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
  …
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
</div>

Mixed vertical alignment

Sass Flag

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.

HTML

<div class="layout layout--full">
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
  <div class=layout__item>…</div>
  <div class="layout__item layout__item--center">…</div>
  <div class="layout__item layout__item--bottom">…</div>
</div>

Right aligned

Sass Flag

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.

HTML

<div class="layout layout--right">
  <div class="layout__item u-1/6">…</div>
  <div class="layout__item u-1/6">…</div>
  <div class="layout__item u-1/6">…</div>
</div>

1/6

1/6

Center aligned

Sass Flag

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.

HTML

<div class="layout layout--center">
  <div class="layout__item u-1/6">…</div>
  <div class="layout__item u-1/6">…</div>
  <div class="layout__item u-1/6">…</div>
</div>
